name: Invasion - (Return of the Toys)
description:
TOY INVASION (version 0.2)

Imagine you are a 10 year old kid, and your favorite dolls came up to live. You are alone at home and they start chasing you, if they detect you.

You have to find the generator room to switch them off, otherwise you will die, because they are attacking. But it isn't that simple how it looks like...

Your parents locked all the doors and hid the keys anywhere. It is also completly dark in your house, so that you need a flashlight for it. But you always have to watch your batterylevel and stamina.

__________________________________________________

Update Blog Version 0.2:

-Fixed a few Bugs with the Zombie Toys

-Added hurt sounds and some other sound effects

-increased Flashlight spot radius / decreased brightness

-new battery texture / decreased battery consumption.

-edited main menu!

Update Blog Version 0.1:

-bugfix -> sometimes enemys didn't attack

-added timer, to show how long this seasson took to finish

_________________________________________________

Control Settings:

W A S D - Movement

Space - Jump

Shift - Run

E- use ( Open doors, collect items)

F - Toggle Flashlight

Good Luck & Have Fun!
